queries.name: Attendance last 7 days
queries.sql: SELECT event_date, campus_id, COUNT(*) AS events FROM pub_k12_attendance_daily WHERE event_date >= current_date - 7 GROUP BY 1,2 ORDER BY event_date DESC;

queries.name: Roster by course
queries.sql: SELECT course_id, COUNT(*) AS students FROM pub_k12_roster GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY students DESC;

queries.name: Grades distribution skew
queries.sql: SELECT course_id, PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY numeric_grade) AS median, AVG(numeric_grade) AS avg FROM pub_k12_grades_term GROUP BY 1;

queries.name: Discipline incidents (deidentified)
queries.sql: SELECT incident_type, campus_id, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM pub_k12_behavior_incidents /* masked columns applied */ GROUP BY 1,2 ORDER BY cnt DESC;

queries.name: HE enrollment by term
queries.sql: SELECT term_code, college, COUNT(*) AS headcount FROM pub_he_enrollment_term GROUP BY 1,2 ORDER BY term_code DESC;
